summary: It’s available on Audible, and via Amazon (if you don’t have an Audible account), and it’s the story of a college graduate whose first job is addressing constituent services for a city government in a district that is heavily populated by aliens — the ones from outer space.  Eventually a chicken is involved, as so […]
title: Constituent Service, My New Audio Novella, is Out on Audible Today!

summary:
Hackers can execute commands on a remote computer by sending malformed emails to a Zimbra mail server.  It’s critical, but difficult to exploit. 
In an email sent Wednesday afternoon, Proofpoint researcher Greg Lesnewich seemed to largely concur that the attacks weren’t likely to lead to mass infections that could install ransomware or espionage malware...
title: Weird Zimbra Vulnerability

summary: I've hidden from trick-or-treaters for 30 years but in 2024 I'm going to turn over a new leaf
title: It's Halloween Again
